document_data.caption: A map showing the Towers of Horus-Re (labeled #24) in the City of the Gods.
document_data.name: Towers of Horus-Re
document_data.location: [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]], [[Skuld]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Towers of Horus-Re''' were a series of sacred towers located in the capital city of [[Skuld]] in [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Towers were located in the southeast corern of the [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]] in the northern central part of the city.
document_data.Description: The complex that housed the Towers was much larger when compared to those of the other [[gods]] within the City of the Gods.
document_data.History: The Towers of Horus-Re served as a home for the [[incarnation]] of [[Horus-Re]], the [[Mulhorandi pantheon|Mulhorandi]] Lord of the Sun. The Towers were built by slaves and were thousands of years old as of the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
